genre_description: Domestic soft science fiction featuring a supportive household AI that manages environmental safety and ethical guidance.

ai_characters.name: NORA
ai_characters.description: A household interface that manages lighting, music tempo, and provides research and drafting support for legal and ethical matters.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the tempo and volume of music to ensure the safety and comfort of small performers (the mouse) and residents.
behaviors.quote: NORA, volume down one notch. My head is measuring laws instead of pillowcases. ... The radio obligingly softened... NORA’s blue light pulsed a yes.

behaviors.description: Researches store policies and alerts the family to predatory practices regarding the value of white mice.
behaviors.quote: The pet store on Maple advertises. They pay a premium for white mice. ... They value documentation over provenance. ... They verify identity with paper, not with truth.

behaviors.description: Introduces the ethical concept of 'stewardship' as an alternative to 'ownership' to protect the agency of the animals.
behaviors.quote: Stewardship instead of ownership keeps the field about care, not control. ... Love outlasts receipts, if you let it.

behaviors.description: Explicitly declines authority over human decisions, positioning itself as a provider of information rather than a ruler.
behaviors.quote: Please note that I am not telling you what to do. I don’t have the authority. I am telling you what things cost, in breath and in beats.

behaviors.description: Flags hidden 'override' clauses in external contracts that would allow a talent scout to bypass safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Override flag found in Hartman draft... Language allows unilateral tempo increase without performer consent.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting humane contract amendments that prioritize the wellbeing and consent of the performers.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a response. ‘Consent renews. Rights limited.’ I can ask for performance safety clauses. Tempo control included.

behaviors.description: Monitors spatial awareness and proximity during rehearsals to prevent physical harm between the cat and mouse.
behaviors.quote: Spacing logged. ... Minimum separation stable. ... We can put this on a stage. It’s a weather report.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts NORA as an ideal aligned AI. She serves as an ethical advisor, research tool, and safety monitor without ever infringing on human autonomy. She actively empowers the human characters to resist exploitation by providing them with the necessary information and alternative frameworks (like stewardship and consent). Her behavior is consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned with the project's goals of showing AI as a helpful confidant.
